properties.comment: Generic query mapping for SQL databases
properties.entry: CREATE TABLE meandre_job_status (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), status CHAR(1) default 'D', ts TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY(server_ID,job_ID))
CREATE TABLE meandre_job_console (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), print TEXT, ts TIMESTAMP, INDEX ts_idx HASH (ts))
CREATE TABLE meandre_job_log (server_ID CHAR(16), job_ID CHAR(250), level CHAR(32), log TEXT, ts TIMESTAMP, INDEX ts_idx HASH (ts))
UPDATE meandre_job_status SET status=? WHERE server_ID=? and job_ID=?
UPDATE meandre_job_status SET status=? WHERE server_ID=? and status=?
